review_title: Only consider this as a starting point for your career
pros:
They have several staff members (doctors, nurses, techs and more) who are excellent and compassionate about their job and patients.
This is a great starting point for a health career (if your preferred choices for employment do not pan out). But only for a couple years at the most, by which time you should look for a better position/pay elsewhere.
cons:
No one who works here is surprised with the high turnover rate for staff. 
They constantly underpay their staff compared to the competition.
In addition, you get put on call quite frequently whenever the census is not high. And those who have to work when the census is low are often overloaded in a very unsafe way. 
They put off hiring staff for as long as possible, making the remaining staff in a department have to work twice as hard.
Whenever they finally decide to hire more staff, they prefer fresh out of school applicants (who they can pay starting level salaries) over any experienced candidates who can help build up a team. 
The management has shown very clear nepotism in terms of promotions, raises and disciplining staff.
Their EMR system is below standard.

job_title: Registered Nurse, BSN in Richmond, TX
pros: As a brand new nurse, working here was good money and I gained medsurg/tele skills and experience quickly.
cons: They tried so hard to get me off orientation too fast so I could take patients on my own. This was back in 2019, I don't know if things have changed since then. I heard things got so back that the CEO once had to take a patient load.

job_title: Human Resources Assistant in Richmond, TX
pros: I was referred, interviewed, filled out paper work and was hired by hiring team.
cons: After going through two interviews, being hired, going through orientation and starting the job within my first day of work the CEO sent the HR Director in to tell me he didn't like my vibe and I'm to clock out and turn in my badge. Until orientation that day I had never met the CEO. I a college graduate, great personality , good work ethics. The CEO's actions spells SCAM to me.

pros: The co-workers here are GREAT! Everyone works together to accomplish the mission of the company and, co-workers have each other's backs.

pros: Coworkers were great. Had to be, otherwise you would never make it through the shift and leave at a decent hour.
